cu.explanation_en: Setting the transport preference to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause transport configuration failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting the preamble received target power to 0 exceeds the maximum allowed value, causing configuration validation failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將前導接收目標功率設定為 0 超過允許的最大值，導致配置驗證失敗。
